newsitem.title: UK: Spain sets 4.0 bln French franc 15-year Eurobond.
newsitem.headline: Spain sets 4.0 bln French franc 15-year Eurobond.

text.p: The following bond was announced by lead manager Paribas.
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 101.145 PAY DATE 10.APR.97
MOODY AA2 LISTING PARIS PAY FREQ ANNUAL
S&P AA DENOMS (K) 10-100-1M SALE LIMITS US/GB/ES
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW SPANISH HOME CTRY SPAIN TAX PROVS STANDARD
UNDERLYING GOVT BOND 6.50 PCT 2011 OAT / 8.50 PCT 2012 OAT
CAISSE DES DEPOTS ET CONSIGNATIONS IS JOINT LEAD.
